extracted_text:
(1.) The maximum building height for a structure adjacent to a residential or
commercial zoning district shall be no greater than 40 feet.
(2.) The maximum building height for a structure adjacent to an industrial zoning
district - no height restrictions.
llm_outputs.rationale: The section explicitly states the maximum building height requirements for the Heavy Industry Overlay (HIO) district. It provides two different height limits depending on the adjacent zoning.
llm_outputs.answer: 40 ft for structures adjacent to residential or commercial zoning; no height restrictions for structures adjacent to industrial zoning
